text: Cristiano Lombardi (born 19 August 1995) is an Italian footballer who plays as a right winger for Serie B club Salernitana, on loan from Lazio. ==Club career== Product of S.S. Lazio youth system, in the 2014–15 season he was sent on loan to Serie B club Trapani, where he played 12 appearances. In the 2015–16 season he was sent on loan to Lega Pro club Ancona, where he played 12 appearances and scoring 4 goals. He made his return in Lazio's first team for the 2016–17 season, making his Serie A debut on 22 August 2016, in the match win 4–3 against Atalanta at Stadio Atleti Azzurri d'Italia, where he scored his debut goal. On 31 August 2017, Lombardi was loaned to Serie A newcomers Benevento on a season-long deal. On 15 January 2019, Lombardo joined on loan to Venezia until 30 June 2020.
